title: Art Before the Horse
author: VD
content_html: Owen Benjamin has posted his first premium content to UNAUTHORIZED.TV. Called ART BEFORE THE HORSE, it is his entire live show at the children’s museum in Denver, and it is exclusive to the channel. All Unauthorized subscribers have access to the show; non-subscribers can purchase it for $9.99.
content_text:
Owen Benjamin has posted his first premium content to UNAUTHORIZED.TV. Called
ART BEFORE THE HORSE
, it is his entire live show at the children’s museum in Denver, and it is exclusive to the channel. All Unauthorized subscribers have access to the show; non-subscribers can purchase it for $9.99.
